tagsFilter.filterBy:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the filter button
**UI Location**: Tracks list page, above the tracks list
**When Users See This**: Always visible on the tracks list page
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Filter by"
tagsFilter.showingAll:
**Functional Purpose**: Status message indicating how many tracks are shown based on filters
**UI Location**: Tracks list page, below the filter button and above the tracks list
**When Users See This**: Always visible on the tracks list page
**Technical Context**: The variable `count` must remain unchanged and represents the number of tracks. Pluralization will be handled by i18n based on `count`.
**Current English**: "Showing {{count}} tracks"
tagsFilter.resetFilters:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to clear all applied filters
**UI Location**: Tracks list page, below the filter button and above the tracks list
**When Users See This**: Only visible when one or more filters are applied
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Reset filters"
